table.caption: Description of configuration options for nicira

tr.td: (IntOpt)Maximum number of ports of a logical switch on a bridged transport zone (default 64)
(IntOpt)Maximum number of ports of a logical switch on an overlay transport zone (default 64)
(BoolOpt)No help text available for this option

(StrOpt)If set to access_network this enables a dedicated connection to the metadata proxy for metadata server access via Quantum router. If set to dhcp_host_route this enables host route injection via the dhcp agent. This option is only useful if running on a host that does not support namespaces otherwise access_network should be used.
(IntOpt)Number of seconds a generation id should be valid for (default -1 meaning do not time out)
